column5: How has every one been doin lately ? whats the report?  I have been doing my share of fishing , but havnt seen many big fish since opener.. how about every one else?  - a fellow angler

Lots of fish on the Tri-Lakes, just small for the most part.  Below average weights have been taking the tournaments this year.  What is usually an average bag of 2 pounders is finishing in the top third.  Bigger fish are harder to come by and they seem scattered, no real pattern showing through as to where they are holding.
